amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2013, LB21, § 2. Operative date June 30, 2014. Laws 2010, LB780, changes; applicability.
amendatorysection.para: The changes made by Laws 2010, LB780 to the Nebraska Workers' Compensation Act apply only to personal injuries that occurred on or after July 15, 2010, and before June 30, 2014.
